parameters.name: permissionNames
parameters.description: An array of permission names to observe. This parameter is required and has not default.

returnValues.name: isSupported
returnValues.description: Returns true if the current environment/browser supports the native Permissions API.

returnValues.name: permissions
returnValues.description: A reactive object where keys are the permission names and values are the current state: 'granted', 'denied', or 'prompt'.
